actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.
Committee on Finance requested executive comment from OMB, International Trade Commission, Office of the U.S. Trade Representative, Treasury Department, State Department, Commerce Department.
Committee on Finance. Ordered favorably reported H.R. 3398 in lieu of this bill.

official_title: A bill to extend until July 1, 1986, the existing suspension of duty on certain textile fabrics used in the manufacture of hovercraft skirts.

summary.text: Amends the Tariff Schedules of the United States to extend the suspension of duty on certain textile fabrics used in the manufacture of hovercraft skirts through June 30, 1986.

titles.title: A bill to extend until July 1, 1986, the existing suspension of duty on certain textile fabrics used in the manufacture of hovercraft skirts.
